title: Justin Trudeau - Wikipedia
snippet: Through the Bernard family, kinsmen of the Earls of Bandon, Trudeau is the fifth great-grandson of Major-General William Farquhar, a leader in the founding of modern Singapore; Trudeau also has remote ethnic Malaccan and Nias ancestry.

title: All About Justin Trudeau's 3 Children, Sons Xavier and Hadrien and Daughter Ella-Grace
snippet: Justin Trudeau and his estranged wife, Sophie Gr√©goire Trudeau, have three kids together: sons Xavier and Hadrien and daughter Ella-Grace. Here is everything to know about Justin Trudeau's children.

title: Trudeau family - Wikipedia
snippet: The Trudeau family is a Canadian political family, originating from the French colonial period, in what is now Quebec. Two members of the family, Pierre Trudeau and Justin Trudeau, have served as the prime minister of Canada.
